alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 27 at 1:28PM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Chuska Mountains, White Mountains, eastern Mogollon Rim, and portions of the Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Localized power outages will be possible. Be wary of tree branches breaking or dead trees falling.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
